column1: '''Patricia Reynolds''' has written and edited books and articles related to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. She is also the Archivist of [[the Tolkien Society]].<ref>{{webcite

**"The Great Wave and Other Dreams in The Lord of the Rings"
**"Are the pictures better in your head?"
** "Further along the road... - [[The Return of the Ring
** "Rings and other Things - Possession and the Possessed"
